Package main.Spil.Model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldActionListener
    Any class the implements a FieldActionListener must have the method onFieldLandedOn(FieldAction action).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChanceCard
    This is an abstract implementation of the ChanceCard.
    ChanceCardMove
    Creates a ChanceCardMove which is a ChanceCard where the rule is that you move by "moveAmount" when you draw it!
    ChanceCardPoints
    Creates a ChanceCardPoints class which is a ChanceCard where the rule is that you get "pointsToGive" when you draw it!
    ChanceFieldActionListener
    ChanceFieldActionListener's main responsibility is to determine if you landed on a ChanceCard and if you have draw & invoke it!
    Dice
    This class is for creating a dice.
    Field
    This class is controlling each field.
    FieldAction
    The FieldAction is an argument used for the FieldActionListener, it encapsulates the state of the game and passes it on This allows ActionListeners to manipulate the state of the game
    GameBoard  
    GameState
    The responsibility of this class is to encapsulates a state of the game I.e. where every player is, the fields of the board, where are the fields and what GUI are we using?
    GameStateMananger  
    JailFieldActionListener
    JailFieldActionListener's main responsibility is to determine if you landed on the "go to jail" field.
    LanguagePack
    This class is used for defining which language to play the game in.
    LanguagePackWrapper  
    Player
    This class is for creating the players.
    PropertyFieldActionListener
    PropertyFieldActionListener's main responsibility is to determine if you landed on a field that is "ownable" If that field IS ownable, but doesnt have an owner then prompt player asking if they wish to purchase it.
    RetrievePlayerDialog
    Create a new dialog asking for player input, then converts that into an player array and returns it
    StartFieldActionListener
    StartFieldActionListener's main responsibility is to determine if we crossed the starting field and reward the Player accordingly
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Field.GUI_Type  
    GameStateMananger.GameStateType  
    LanguagePackWrapper.LanguageType
